glosses: something upper compared to something else, upper

examples.text: Ve burası da evin üst kısımı
examples.translation: And this is the upper part of the house

glosses: something of higher degree in classifying systems or in hierarchies compared to something else

examples.text: O benden daha üst bir makamda
examples.translation: He is of higher rank than me

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish اوست (üst), from Proto-Turkic *üŕ-t (“on top, high above”), derivative of *ǖŕ. Cognate with üzeri.
